post:
We were glad to announce that we released our first physical server 10 days ago, located in Romania.

About all VPS Servers:

Pure SSD storage (Samsung 860 EVO disks)
1Gbps shared network connection
Unlimited monthly traffic (but we'll check your network activity if it passes 5TB per month)
SolusVM control panel
Voxility AntiDDoS protection free and guaranteed. (Up to 1Tbps Layer4 attacks)

⭐ **VPS SSD 2GB**
Intel® Xeon® E5-2697 v2
**1 vCPU** @ boost 3.50 GHz
**2GB** DDR3 ECC
**30GB** Disk Space SSD
**Unlimited** Bandwidth
**AntiDDoS** PRO @ **Voxility** Included
**1Gbps** Connection
Location: **Bacau, Romania**
Price: **4,70 USD/mo** (for annual payment only, 5,90 USD/mo for monthly recurring)

⭐ **VPS SSD 4GB**
Intel® Xeon® E5-2697 v2
**2 vCPU** @ boost 3.50 GHz
**4GB** DDR3 ECC
**40GB** Disk Space SSD
**Unlimited** Bandwidth
**AntiDDoS** PRO @ **Voxility** Included
**1Gbps** Connection
Location: **Bacau, Romania**
Price: **6,60 USD/mo** (for annual payment only, 8,25 USD/mo for monthly recurring)

https://www.hazi.ro/vps.php

Best regards, Florin.
